name: Our Final Sky
description:
Our Final Sky

The destroyed city with an active automatic defense system destroying air targets that are destroying the city.

Controls

Mouse = Aim the turret

Left Mouse Button = Fire

1/2/3 = Switching between slots

Credits

DSEG font family https://www.keshikan.net/fonts-e.html

Monogram font https://datagoblin.itch.io/monogram

Music A Different World Below https://jonas-tyroller.itch.io/wowie-pack

Artwork by Me

Game programing by Me
